name: RPG Tsukuru: Super Dante
overview: RPG Tsukuru: Super Dante ("RPG Maker: Super Dante") is a game creation tool for aspiring RPG creators and part of the long-running RPG Tsukuru/RPG Maker series. It was published as both a Super Famicom cart and through the Satellaview service. It is the first of two games from the RPG Maker series to be released for the Super Famicom, and the third overall (if only counting games with the RPG Tsukuru brand). Players use the tool to create the world via a tile-set map editor, the player's party by choosing stats and an avatar, the story, and events through a basic scripting language.
